traits.Death Burst: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.Cinder Breath (Recharge 6): The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mephit's next turn.
